metadata.purpose: Opening/hook sentences for B2 essay introductions
metadata.description: Topic context and attention-grabbing opening sentences

introduction_context.label: Introduction - Opening Hook
introduction_context.purpose: Grab attention and introduce the topic naturally

default: Nowadays, [topic] is a regular part of everyday life.
In recent years, [topic] has become a widely discussed issue.
Many people argue that [topic] has changed the way we live.
It is common to hear different opinions about [topic].
There is ongoing debate about whether [topic] does more good than harm.
alt1: These days, [topic] affects many people's lives.
[Topic] has sparked considerable debate in recent years.
It is widely accepted that [topic] plays an important role in modern society.
People hold strong views about whether [topic] is beneficial or harmful.
Few would deny that [topic] has had a significant impact on how we live.
alt2: Over the past few years, [topic] has become increasingly common.
There is growing recognition that [topic] can have both positive and negative effects.
[Topic] has become a subject of intense discussion worldwide.
While some welcome [topic], others have serious concerns about it.
It is worth examining [topic] from multiple perspectives.

introduction_context.label: Introduction - Problem Context
introduction_context.purpose: Introduce the problem and its importance

default: Nowadays, [problem] is becoming a serious issue in [place/area].
In recent years, more people have been affected by [problem].
Many people are concerned about [problem], especially because it affects [group].
It is clear that [problem] can have negative effects on [area].
This situation has become more noticeable due to [cause].
alt1: These days, [problem] is causing significant difficulties in [area].
[Problem] has emerged as a major challenge in recent years.
It is widely recognized that [problem] affects many aspects of [area].
Few would deny that [problem] is becoming more widespread.
The issue of [problem] deserves serious attention because...
alt2: Over the past few years, there has been a worrying rise in [problem].
[Problem] poses significant challenges for [society/group].
Recent studies show that [problem] is becoming more common and complex.
There is growing concern about the impact of [problem] on [area].
Given its scale and consequences, [problem] requires urgent action.

introduction_context.label: Introduction - Situation Context
introduction_context.purpose: Introduce the phenomenon and show relevance

default: In recent years, [phenomenon] has become much more common.
Nowadays, [phenomenon] affects many people in [place/area].
It seems that [phenomenon] is changing the way people [do something].
Many people have noticed a rise in [phenomenon].
This development has attracted attention because it influences [area].
alt1: These days, [phenomenon] is increasingly evident in [area].
[Phenomenon] has emerged as a significant trend in recent years.
It is widely observed that [phenomenon] is reshaping [area].
There has been a marked increase in [phenomenon] over the past decade.
The growing prevalence of [phenomenon] raises important questions about...
alt2: Over the past few years, [phenomenon] has become a defining feature of [area].
[Phenomenon] represents a significant shift in how [group] [do something].
Few would dispute that [phenomenon] has become increasingly common.
Recent developments suggest that [phenomenon] is here to stay.
As [phenomenon] continues to grow, it is important to understand its origins and impact.

introduction_context.label: Introduction - Debate Context
introduction_context.purpose: Introduce the statement and show it is debated

default: Some people believe that [statement], while others disagree.
There is a lot of discussion about whether [statement] is true.
Opinions are divided on the idea that [statement].
This topic often leads to disagreement between different groups.
People have strong views on both sides of this issue.
alt1: The question of whether [statement] is highly controversial.
[Statement] is a claim that provokes considerable debate.
There is no consensus on whether [statement].
Views on [statement] vary widely across society.
The validity of [statement] remains hotly contested.
alt2: Whether [statement] is a matter of ongoing debate.
People are deeply divided over the question of [statement].
The proposition that [statement] has both supporters and critics.
Few topics generate as much disagreement as [statement].
Given the complexity of the issue, examining all perspectives is essential.

default: Nowadays, [topic] is an important issue for many people.
In recent years, [topic] has become more common in everyday life.
Many people have different opinions about [topic].
[Topic] often leads to strong reactions and debate.
It is a topic that affects [group] in particular.
alt1: These days, [topic] plays a significant role in [area].
[Topic] has become a subject of widespread discussion.
People are increasingly concerned about [topic].
The question of [topic] matters because...
Few issues attract as much attention as [topic].
alt2: Over the past few years, [topic] has gained prominence.
[Topic] represents an important challenge/opportunity for [group].
There is growing awareness of the significance of [topic].
As society evolves, [topic] has become increasingly relevant.
The importance of [topic] cannot be overstated.

introduction_context.label: Introduction - Trend Context
introduction_context.purpose: Introduce the trend and show it is growing

default: Nowadays, there is a growing trend towards [trend].
Over the past few years, [trend] has become much more common.
These days, it is normal to see people [trend/action].
More and more people are choosing to [action] instead of [alternative].
This shift is happening in many countries, not just one.
alt1: In recent years, [trend] has gained considerable momentum.
[Trend] is increasingly prevalent in [area/society].
A noticeable shift toward [trend] can be observed.
The tendency to [action] is becoming more widespread.
[Trend] represents an emerging pattern in [area].
alt2: Contemporary society is witnessing a marked increase in [trend].
The trajectory toward [trend] is unmistakable.
[Trend] has evolved from a marginal phenomenon to a mainstream reality.
An accelerating trend toward [action] is evident across [areas].
The landscape of [area] is being reshaped by [trend].
